Come, rest on a couch and hear your life pass before your eyes while you listen to the most intelligent sound on the Playa transcend you into a state of temporary eternal bliss. Couches and Bass, end of story.
name: The Couch Prophecy

description: Booze, Broads & Live Music.
name: The Crossroads

description: The Crown Collective, Home Port of the Lady Sassafras, playa riverboat and Guardian of the Groove!
name: The Crown Collective

description: Explore the Dirty-y Nasty – a visual, aural and tactile experience on the playa.
name: The Dirt-y Nasty

description: Feeling a little Playafried? Then it’s time to do like the dude and abide. Or at least bowl a few rounds with your friends and chill in our Lebowski inspired shaded lounge. We’ll have two bowling lanes – with real balls and pins – and a shaded lounge to chill. If you’re lucky, Bunnie may be there making White Russians, but you never know.
name: The Dude Ranch

description: Where the worlds most fabulous musicians and dancers from MarchFourth Marching Band, Vagabond Opera, and The Saloon Ensemble are dumped and recycled to endlessly create music from a by-gone era.  Come sing, dance, play our piano, and join-in as we all share electronic-free acoustic joy!
name: The Dump

description: Do you make stuff, have stuff, gift stuff? If you want other people’s stuff, come to The Exchange. It’s what we do. (and we like virgins)
name: The Exchange

description: The Fertile Crescent is the rebirthplace of civilization. Here the 10 principles are reimagined by the artisans and prophets of Animus.  And the denizens of the Sacred Cow feed the masses with a bounty of Middle Eastern cuisine.  The result is an experience which satisfies the mind, soul and stomach.
name: The Fertile Crescent

description: The G-Spot is a often hard to find and always pleasurable location in the warm (sometimes frigid) wonderful lower region of the Black Rock Desert, deep inside the fantasy zone known as Black Rock City where, you may discover an incredible welcoming environment. “The G-Spot if You Can’t Find Us …You Are Not Coming”!
name: The G-Spot

description: The Gnomiest place in BRC to come frolic, play, and relax! Make your self at home in our Gnome Dome! Look for our red and white mushroom dome!
name: The gNome Dome

description: Black Rock City, 1917: The WWI flying ace dips his whiskers in his mug of root beer while Loosie, the lovely barmaid, eyes him mischievously and pours cold absinthe. He’s a long way from Tipperary… Suddenly, a tri-plane appears overhead. Curse you, Red Baron!!!  Come try our ice cold root beer in the afternoon, and absinthe one hour before dusk.
name: The Green Hour

description: Where the wisdom of the gypsies frolics with the mischievousness of the monkeys.  Have your fortune read in the morning and join us for philosophy and popcorn in the evening.
name: The Gypsymonkeys

description: Spreading the word on crocheted art the hapless hookers are bringing knowledge of hookery and distributing playa made hats to any passerby who seem to be without personal portable shade. May the hook be with you.
name: The Hapless Hooker

description: A buzzing mass of madness from the East descends upon the desert, full of burning light and energy. Is the Hive full of honey, or stings? Bathe in our glow, and discover!
name: The Hive

description: Come to the Hookah Lounge and enjoy our premium flavored tobaccos, teas, and coffee. Our Moroccan style lounge serves up shisha filtered through juice and water every night starting at sundown. The plush seating, soft carpeting, and great people make this the ultimate chill-out zone.
name: The Hookah Lounge

description: Bringing you the conveniences of a mini-mart… with the inconveniences of a medieval slip and slide.  Chapstick, rebar, carabiners and more… spin the wheel my dear, spin the wheel.
name: The Inconvenience Store

description: Ah, the Institute… of higher learning? higher earning? higher yearning?  Perhaps…or perhaps just a center for the study of the wide-spread, grievous affliction of bicoastal disorder. We’ll never tell–we merely guarantee round-the-clock experiments with the edges of art, technology, and movement.
hometown: San Francisco, New York, Los Angeles
name: The Institute

description: The Janky Barge collective is a collective of artists, DJs, producers, dancers, builders, mayhem enthusiasts, and mischief makers. A family of friends that works hard and plays hard, we aim to provide some of the most tasteful and eclectic music to the furthest reaches of the Playa.
name: The Janky Barge

description: Stop by The Lemonade Stand for delicious, ice cold, lemonade!
name: The Lemonade Stand

description: The mysterious wheel of uncertainty and mystical inclusion? is the spirit of the small town carnival mixed with the magic of burning man. The Participants will spin a large wheel and depending on where it stops will be directed to do things that you might not do in the default world.
matched_name: mysterious wheel of uncertainty and mystical inclusion?, The
name: The mysterious wheel of uncertainty and mystical inclusion?

description: Located in the heart of The Fertile Crescent Village, the Oasis of the Sacred Cow miraculously arises to replenish the spirits and fill the bellies of wandering burners, tempting desert nomads with the smell of roasting shawarma and falafel and the sounds of gnawa funk, electro-persian-beats, melodic Arabic violin and bedouin drums. During its TUESDAY SUNSET FERTILITY FEAST, the Oasis will celebrate the builders and artists of BRC with copious middle eastern cuisine, freshly-brewed cocktails and exotic ente
name: The Oasis of the Sacred Cow

description: The Phage is an homage to the vast dark ecology whose foment gave birth to Earth’s living diversity. These ubiquitous viral life forms evolve faster than any other life on earth. In their furious co-optive radiations they have acted as the vital genetic pollinators that wove long-separated lines of cellular life into resplendent new threads — the phage are the needles of life’s tapestry. Beware if you encounter us: memetic biohazards lie ahead.
name: The Phage

description:
Come test and explore your current beliefs about experiences that have caused you to feel re-born.
In the exhibit, the participants’ physiological output from a polygraph will be monitored and projected onto a large screen.  Participants will view videos of universal experiences of the human lifecycle and have their reactions monitored by our polygraph machine. Participants may have the opportunity to gain new insight into old and pivotal memories.After traversing through our “birth-canal”, enjoy a perso
name: The Polygraph Camp

description: …a San Francisco Bay Area-based collective of good folks bringing a little mirth and music and games to The Playa in 2012…yep
name: The Pongo Lounge

description: Come play and enjoy your time. Resist the  “”"”"”"
name: The Resistance

description: The future is here! Be born again – AS A MIGHTY ROBOT! Discard your pathetic human flesh and upgrade yourself! The Robot Factory provides all the materials you need to turn yourself into an amazing cardboard box robot. Transform yourself from Monday-Saturday, 2pm to 5pm. Robo-Coolant and Essential Fluids served at the bar. Calibrate your upgraded aural sensors with high technology musics and flex your servos on our cybernetic dance floor. BECOME A BETTER YOU – AT THE ROBOT FACTORY!
hometown: Los Angeles / San Diego / Vancouver / New York
name: The Robot Factory

description: We will have several laserium / planetarium shows per evening, along with a concessions stand serving popcorn, and, well, booze. The concession stand will be open for matinees.
name: The Scarsdale Laserium

description: Get out of the sun! An afternoon shade oasis and lounge, with drinks, beats, and an observation deck to peer out into the great beyond.
name: The Shady Motherfuckers

description: The Shallow End provides themed parties and daily events to the citizens of BRC.  You can always count on us to be “shallow” and to provide you with a wonderful experience founded upon the 10 event principles.
name: The Shallow End

description: The Space Between offers a relaxed environment to reflect on the space between one playa experience and the next while enjoying our special revival tacos and patented and trademarked rebirth drink.  We will provide the cocktails and music, you bring the dreams.
name: The Space Between

description: Back again The Spenard Bar brings its eclectic group of Alaskans and freinds to the playa to quinch your thirst and entertain your fancys. Offering libations and celebrations daily with fire performances nightly.
name: The Spenard Bar

description: The Booby Bar is no more – but a few ex-Boobarians and friends are seeking to continue the spirit and traditions of Terminal City’s favorite nightclub into 2012. Theme Night parties, breathtaking costumes, amazing music, and a rockin’ (new) bar will be the hallmarks of BRC’s new Den of Divine Decadence. We welcome divas of all genders, orientations, and experience – just be fabulous, bay-bee!
name: The Swish Embassy (Booby Bar 2.0)

description: Since 1997 the TriBe has been entertaining Black Rock denizons with “over the top” Art, Music, unique theme camps and debauchery. Stop by our open bar for a chat or get involved! We pride ourselves as a group of questionably sane burners from ALL walks of life.
name: The TriBe

description:
Our theme is ‘The Ultimate Fuzzy Celebration’, bringing you the Yin and Yang of the Burning Man experience this year: a continual party celebrating the end of the world and a transcendence into deep comfort and relaxation under the stars.
And lots of champagne.
name: The Ultimate Fuzzy Celebration

description: The V-SPoT is Burning Man’s official Volunteer Headquarters in Black Rock City. Where VCs, Managers and Staff come to seek Volunteers and where Burners come to find out how to help. Our friendly Volunteer Experts are here to answer your questions and help you find your “special place” on the Playa. Volunteer needs change often; we work pre-event to post-event and have lots of ways for you to contribute!
name: The V-SPoT

description:
Find your Inner Groove at the Velvet Rut, featuring smooth beats mixed with velvety treats…..If you’re in a rut and can’t get off your butt, don’t get stuck – come talk to us!
See what happens when the Velvet Rut lowers the bar and takes Mediocrity to all new level with….The Mediocre Race 2012: Race Against Time to the End of the Line!
name: The Velvet Rut

description: Our Camp is an oasis on the playa for the Wandering Burner who happens upon our camp and finds HUGS, libation and Hot Dogs. We also provide information about the Black Rock’s early inhabitants/explorers/wanders, provided on a kiosk for all to enjoy!
name: The Wanderer’s Camp

description: Ever-changing Themes reflecting our ever-changing city.
name: Theme of the Moment Camp

description: Swings (of course!), aerial silk, an adult-sized cradle, shaded hammocks, and the mesmerizing Chaos Pendulums will put more swing in your thing than you ever thought possible. If you’d like to share your swing, join us after dark for The Bonobo Lodge, a heated dome for adult workshops and play.
name: Things That Swing

description: Bullshit! is the new awesome and this camp is full of it!  We are hosting salsa dance workshops/parties throughout the week, also stop by to turn your bike into a raging bull so that you can stampede with us through the streets of Black Rock city during the annual Running of the Bulls at the end of the week, plus the Joust is back and much more.  So check the playa schedule, because This Camp is Bullshit!
name: This Camp is Bullshit!

description: Home to the Death Star Art Car and lovers of Star Wars. We love IV-VI and we hate Alderaan.
matched_name: This is Not the Camp You're Looking For
name: This is Not the Camp You’re Looking For

description: Tikal 2012: Pyronauts & Jedi Alliance is a nexus of Guardians from around the Galaxy, dedicated to the development of our personal and interplanetary relationships and progression of various metaphysical studies, dynamic art, and movement forms.  Based in infrastructure modeled after Tikal in Guatemala, we honor the ancient mayan wisdom and bridge it with the future.  Hosting a multitude of Galactic educators, speakers, and performers, this camp is a hub for Guardian initiates and seasoned Masters.
name: Tikal 2012: Pyronauts & Jedi Alliance

description: Join us for a 360-degree view of Black Rock City and Playa from the Tiki Tower. Welcome jet-setters, sophisticated hipsters, cocktail lounge-crawlers, and suave wahines to our hideaway for cool, meaningless conversation and partying at the Tiki Bar
name: TIKI³ (Tower, Tunes, and Titillation)

description:
Time Of Your Life Burning Man camp has been successfully serving Margaritas, Love, and new times of your life since 2008, burning since 2000.  It’s been a beautiful build of friendships, fun, and the best camp we could dream of.

WE LOVE BURNING MAN! WE LOVE YOU!  Every year, we come together from Costa Rica, Reno, Boise, Las Vegas, L.A, N California, Vancouver, Whistler, Oregon, Mexico, and Russia to converge on the place we call HOME.
name: Time of Your Life!

description: Join us at the Tinkery. Create, Make, Repurpose and Take. Find new uses for old and new materials. Play, create and share your knowledge and skills. Use your problem solving skills and have some fun.
name: Tinkery

description: Lost? Confused? Runny nose? Don’t know what to go do next? Camp Tissue and a Plan is dedicated to making sure no burner wanders the playa without a clear plan and a clean tissue. ‘Cause all you really need is a tissue and a plan…
name: Tissue and a Plan

description: Marshmallows, Chocolate, and Bacon.  Oh My!
hometown: Lake Tahoe and Sun Valley, Idaho
name: Titicaca

description: The Tittyman Camp, Where Burners have given their Body and Soul for twelve Years, Evolution: “Such a Simple Word.”
name: Tittyman Camp

description: ToneAge SlimFast is looking forward to it’s 5th year anniversary in 2012! Made up of a diverse group of folks from (primarily) Denver, SF, and Vancouver, this bunch of damn dirty burners can’t wait to get it on with you!
name: ToneAge SlimFast

description: Totenkitten is a fascist demagoguery devoted to crushing all opposition and imposing our will on the masses; initially conceived as a reaction to the decadent weakness of of other organizations, Totenkitten quickly took on a life of its own. If you can’t tell whether we’re serious about this, you should attend one of our propaganda seminars (bacon and beer will be served).
name: Totenkitten

description: Looking for the perfect pair of shades to go with that costume?  Come on over to Trader Shady’s, sunglass exchange camp to swap stories and sunnies on your way.
name: Trader Shady’s

description: This year, the Rant O Matic returns. The heckling never went away.
location: w/in Dr Carl’s Department of Collections
name: Trashistan

description: A verdant home alive with the warmth of aloha!  Castaways welcomed to paddle up to the tiki lights and toast the night with a Mai Thai.
name: Tropical Treehouse

description: Providing proper Bass Culture Appreciation in a perception changing way. Experience our unique interactive sound installation capable of low frequency transduction = vibrating platforms that will rattle ur bones & wobble ur rump!
name: Tsunami Bass Experience ~Wobble tha’ ~WaVe~

description: A welcome respite from the dusty flood waters offering YOU fabulous Playa Fashion Makeovers, cooling snow cones, “Wordsmithing”, a variety of live music performances, and host to the 5th Annual Lake Lahontan Ice Hockey Game(s) where the only ice involved is the dirty chunk we hit from bar to bar with hockey sticks whilst dressed in sexy fishnet stockings and sparkly uniform tops.
name: Tsunami Camp

description: Come perform for your dinner where the spaghetti flows like water! Show off bizarre talents, hang out with puppets, and get in on a A Capella dubstep session for a pasta dinner, beer ’til it runs out, and neon liquor drinks.
name: Twilight Spaghetti Theater

description: Twin Freaks, where you’ll find the Black Lodge, mornings ushered in with a damn fine cup of coffee and pie that is nothing short of a miracle.  Consult the talking log, seek solace from the searing heat, and help uncover new clues in the death of Laura Palmer.  The owns are not what they seem.
name: Twin Freaks

description: Best weddings on playa, Unofficial Playa Civil Unions (incl. rings/certificate), Black Rock Temporary Divorce, Annulments, Annoying Phone Booth, Crazy Traffic Light, Dreams Visions Hallucinations Fantasies and Joslyn’s Little House of Oral Delights.
name: Two Lanterns

description: Participants who wander into our dark sinister bar will be given quests to complete, sending the adventurer out into the event with purpose to experience new parts of Burning Man. To the brave, who complete our quests, we offer libation to restore health and mana, and a prize to honor their achievement! Goth Industrial music, Jerk Church, and plenty of sexy are to be had at the Undercity!
name: Undercity

description: The Unknown Fields Division is a nomadic design studio that ventures out on annual expeditions to the ends of the earth exploring unreal and forgotten landscapes, alien terrains and obsolete ecologies. Under our floating UFO’s we are both visionaries and reporters, part documentarians and part science fiction soothsayers as we examine the unknown fields between truth and fiction.
name: Unknown Fields Division

description: VegCamp invites people to consider how their choices affect animals, the environment, & their own health.  This year we’re planning vegan food giveaways, our popular Ask-a-Vegan booth, movies, lectures, discussions, photo exhibits, & more.
name: VegCamp

description: Nightly video projection on our two big screens. Host of the BRC 48 Hour Film Project. Body painting, airbrushing and spray paint art every afternoon in our dome. Come and play Playa Jeopardy on Wednesday Night. Live Rocky Horror Picture Show on Friday Night. Contact us if you have an original video you’d like to show. Located in Snowflake Village.
name: Videogasm

description: We serve Vietnamese Iced Coffee in the hot afternoon to dusty denizens of Black Rock City. Get out of the sun, make a new friend!
name: Vietnamese Iced Coffee Experience (VICE Camp)

description: Think you can’t rock a hula hoop and too embarrassed to try in front of everyone? Come by Virgin Hooper Camp and we’ll find just the right sized hoop to make sure you will be spinning in no time!
name: Virgin Hooper Camp

description: “Spermazoa and Ovum Swinging Ring Fertility Adventures!”
name: Volcano Worshippers

description: Do you have music that can’t be tied down by a plug? Bring it to the “Volta Ao Mundo” Camp between noon and 6pm and enjoy an intimate unamplified venue to chillax away from the DubStepped Esplanade and the Art Car circuit.
name: Volta ao Mundo Camp

description: Everyday – At the Voodoo Shooting Gallery, visitors may stop exercise their demons by shooting blowing guns at Voodoo dolls and win plastic glow-in-the-dark cups emblazoned with our camp logo.
name: Voodoo Shooting Gallery

description: Hot Soup Live Music
name: Voodoo Soup

description: Providing true belly laughs (not pitty chuckles), a wonderful safe halfpipe, a busted down whiskey shack and real live punk rock year after year is what we do. Not a kids camp, adults only please. We’ll be open.
name: Voted Best Camp

description: Vulcantown returns again to bring object manipulation to the playa!  Come play learn and share in the shade.
name: Vulcantown

description: Survivors of an ill conceived ticket lottery, VW Bus Camp invites Black Rock City’s great new cohort of Playa virgins arriving in a VW bus to join us on our fertile camp ground, ready to be re-sown with love and with play. This, our 15th year on the Playa.
name: VW Bus Camp

description: Come get high on our Pipe Dream!
name: Warp Zone

description: Come have fun and bounce around!
hometown: Santa Cruz, CA; Grand Coulee, WA; Ulm, Germany
name: We Come in Pieces

description:
The Boise & Denver crew from “Altitude Lounge” unite again with the Bay Area folks from the “I’m OK, You’re OK Corral” to form the “We’re OK Village” for 2012!
Join our daily playa virgin round-ups on the village mutant vehicle – complete with OK Corral branding station. Be sure to catch a sunrise on our spectacular 5 story lighted tower too!  After that stop by our sister camp Zanzibar for a cocktail or two on the house!!
name: We’re OK Village

description: Experience the classic WEASEL SURPRISE…or devise your own prop-based improvisational gift in the weasel’s workshop.
name: Weasel Surprise

description: The WetSpot Bar & Faceplant Lounge: Welcome to the best place on the playa to enjoy a home crafted beer while relaxing in our unique lounge. WetSpot is about making new friends in an open to all setting while engaging in musings around one of our favorite pastimes: brewing beer. Our crew includes homebrewers and non-homebrewers alike and provides an inviting atmosphere to sample and learn about the art and science of brewing beer as well as just having fun.
name: Wet Spot

description: What Would Duct Tape be Doing?… Embracing Virgins! We Love Virgins and will be gifting Duct Tape Burning Man Virgin Survival Kits, Duct tape art, MOOP pouches, bracelets, shirts, pants, just holding things together or holding you together. Mix with us and find out. Be sure to come by and add your fertility to our community art project, the duct tape mural.
name: What Would Duct Tape Do? (WWDTD?)

description: We are back and ready to Wheelie! Help us help you have a wheelie good time on the playa by teaching you a walking wheelie or a serious long distance wheelie. Either way you wheelie, it will be a wheelie good time. Nighttime viewing of the Tesla Coil will be in full effect this year, along with the Picnic Table art car back again, with new LED top, running strong since 1998! Also, foot love station will be back again!
name: Wheelie Camp

description: When life gives you lemons…. make lemonade, limoncello, lemon drops? If our refreshing brew doesn’t make you happy, our positive vibes and friendly campers will.  Pucker up!
name: When life gives you lemons…

description: Howdy all you Playa Goers!!! Join your Mom as she adventures through the wacky wonderland of Black Rock City. The search is on! Have YOU found your Mom yet?  Let us help you relocate your womb space
name: Where’s Your Mom? Camp

description: Dazzling dames delight you with aerial performances and tutorials while gorgeous gents greet you with fresh refreshments and a shady reprieve with a whole lot of love.
name: Whisker Biscuit

description:
We are a Whiskey camp with a small habitual yoga problem.
Our concept is simple. Capitalize on what the Burning Man community desires more of (Yoga, Lyra performances, Juggling, and Hooping). At the same time, be challenging and creative to show the community something; anything that is new and different.
name: Whiskey and Dust

description:
The Whiskey and Whores Saloon occupies the second floor of Johnny Lafitte Ice House in the French Quarter.
Sidle on up and ring the bell, or climb on up and spin the wheel.
In return, we *will* hand you a shot… IF you strip over the railing – and/or, entertain all of Bourbon Street…
[Not necessarily in that order!!!]
name: Whiskey and Whores

description: The White Dragon Noodle Bar returns for it’s 9th trip to the playa! Come by our noodlebar when the sun hits the mountains for our hot, salty noodles with a side of sarcasm and appreciation for your mom.  If you’re old enough, try our signature drinks, the Legopener and the Trucker Bomb.
name: White Dragon Noodle Bar

description: Come party like a superstar! We may not be fancy, but were home and were your friendly trashy neighbors! we’ve got a great stage for dancing/performing, stripper poles, music, & shaded comfy couch area. BYOcup to pimp out n enjoy WT lemonade @lemonade bar or sterility bar. Get an Airbrush “camp stamp” tattoo. Home to the picean bar mutant vehicle; when its not out n about the party is here at home!  just look for our redneck battle trucks!
name: White Trash Superstars

description: The Question on everyone’s mind at some point or another is “WhoofARTed?”  We are a camp dedicated to helping newbies, providing a landmark until LATE in the week, and helping others refresh, rehydrate, remodel, and relax…  And, maybe helping figure out who, indeed, farted.
name: WhoofARTed?

description: Come relax in our hammocks and listen to the sounds of the oceans of the pacific northwest.  You can learn more about us by visiting our website.
name: Wild Oasis

description: Woop Woop is Australian slang for Distant, Remote Even. We are Distant, Remote Even. From the default, from the unreal places elsewhere. Find us.
name: Woop Woop

description:
Join us for fresh organic produce, engaging conversation and a relaxing place to replenish.

Help us devour 1000 pounds of fruit!

Open Monday-Friday from noon until sunset or the produce runs out.
matched_name: World's Most Inviting Climate Fruit Bar.
name: World’s Most Inviting Climate Fruit Bar.

description: Come join us for an afternoon glass of sherry; we are little old ladies who have joined together to answer the questions you were afraid to ask your mother or grandmother. You can try to shock us but we have probably been there and done that at least once. If you run out of questions but we haven’t run out of sherry, then we will read you a tale of woe or fantasy. We look forward to meeting you.
name: WOW – Women Out Wandering

description: The Yellow Gorilla Lounge focus is on creating a social space dedicated to activities, both actual and theatrical, which add value to the Black Rock City community and facilitates expression of the Official Annual Theme.
name: Yellow Gorilla Lounge

description: No lotteries here… we’re not “No! Have None.”  To the contrary, the Tiki Gods demand your bountiful presence at the “Yes! Have Some” camp. Sacrifice your sobriety to the Angry Tiki Gods during the  ritual each evening as the day transforms to night. Partake in a variety of Tiki-themed attractions.  Lounge, drink, play.
name: Yes! Have Some

description: YATB: Yet Another Tiki Bar… Burning Man is so great that I just HAD to have a camp that offered rest, relaxation and rejoicing to as many fellow Burners as possible.  Since I’m not so creative, it’s just another tiki bar.
name: Yet Another Tiki Bar

description: A cool place to chill! We’ll have the shade of an igloo and cooling arctic winds.
name: Yeti Winter Wonderland

description: Live interactive performance oriented camp uniting burners through laughter, curiosity, and consciousness.  Mobile group performances, social experiments, storytelling, workshops and home of The Yum Cart… people leave with a smile and often come back for seconds.
name: Yummy RUMInations

description: ZEN AS FUCK brings the soul to black rock city, with a live soul music venue and a place to chill out and spiritualize. Come groove, get your boogie down, and meditate to the beats of the fro… just make sure to take off your fucking shoes.
name: Zen As Fuck

description: We are Zip Ties & Beer; named after the two things that hold our camp together. Come by and say hello, we’ll have plenty of both for you when your camp is falling apart – looking forward to meeting you!
name: ZipTies & Beer 2.0

description: An undead shit-show with an predilection for beez. Come join in on the grotesque debauchery and resurrect your passion for brainz, booze, and beez – warning: super sloppy fun times await you!
name: Zombeez

description:
Welcome to the Rusty Hanger, Black Rock City’s Sexual Health and Wellness Clinic (and Bar).

Drop by for drinks in the afternoon and food in the evening while enjoying some open-mic support groups (Erotic Abstinence-Only, Oedipal, and more) and general sexual health (mis)education.  At night we’ll have drinks and music.

Come for the drinks, stay for the people, leave with the crabs.
name: (TMWC) The Rusty Hanger, BRC Sexual Wellness Clinic

description:
The Ooligan’s are back with musical delights, visual adventures and our own special brand of mischevious mayhem!  Come for a funnel with Ting Tong Techno, and stay for some visual projection mapping delights.
We are an eclectic outfit, with a number of returning burners inspired to give back to Black Rock City, plus some new collaborators and dedicated music makers, united in our desire to bring a tongue-in-cheek and sensually provoking corner of surreal silliness to the desert.
name: )’(OOligan Alley (the H is silent)

description: Thus spake Psychedelic Moses, down from Black Rock Mount: “The Playa delivered unto me two tablets of stone…” And thus were the 10 Principles forever spliced with the 10 Commandments, creating: THE TEN COMMANCIPLES! Our mission: to educate Burner virgins and veterans alike as to the true spirit of the Burning Man ethos. Visit our 24′ long PSA/photo op to pose as Psychedelic Moses bearing the 10 Commanciples Tablets. Also, check out Potentiality, the newest sculpture from our resident art company Animus.
name: 10 Commanciples Camp

description: We are collecting thoughts and information to feed the universal consciousness. Please come share your thoughts with us!
name: 100′th Monkey Camp

description: No saints allowed – this is a camp for the sinner in you! Monday through Saturday, come chill in the deep shade of our lush desert oasis lounges – and between 5pm and 7pm enjoy top notch G&Ts and snacks in our ’7 Deadly Gins’  bar (a sin may win a gin from our djinn!), play our hilarious and naughty games, and leave your mark on our interactive art piece that will be created entirely by our patrons.
hometown: Bend, Oregon (but over 50% of camp members are from Europe, Australia, or Canada)
name: 7 Deadly Gins

description:
Embrace the Heat as the Playa’s friendliest little slice of Hell returns for the 12th straight year!
Night brings what sinners want- Libations and the ever popular WHEEL OF SINS where our highly skilled and dedicated staff happily delivers absolution & encouragement with a FIRM hand! So come earn your “Get Out of HELL Free” card, and remember: Start your SINS at 7!
name: 7 Sins Lounge

description: A pirate bohemia where merrymaking, gypsy lounging, dancing rhythms and mischief run aground.  Beware, it is futile to resist the 7 Siren’s call!
name: 7 Sirens Cove

description:
The public is advised that any reports of strange transmissions in the area are false.
Under no condition should they investigate these reports. Do not bring a radio receiver to this location.
Anyone investigating with contraband radios will be dealt with accordingly.
You have been warned.
name: ÆtherForce Home Bass – Project: Side Mission
